name: Sheesh Adventures
summary:
Sheesh! is an impossible runner game where a little sheep is trying to escape from the butcher. 
The name of Sheesh! is referring to shish kebab which is a well known Turkish meal made with mutton.

Main goal is to run as far as you can. Butcher is chasing you and there are more than 50 levels to escape. The game has a randomly generated gameplay which makes it a little bit tough to achieve.
